pkgmetadata.longdescription: Assessment of Regression Models Performance // Utilities for computing measures to assess model quality, which are not directly provided by R's 'base' or 'stats' packages. These include e.g. measures like r-squared, intraclass correlation coefficient (Nakagawa, Johnson Schielzeth (2017) doi:10.1098/rsif.2017.0213), root mean squared error or functions to check models for overdispersion, singularity or zero-inflation and more. Functions apply to a large variety of regression models, including generalized linear models, mixed effects models and Bayesian models. References: Ldecke et al. (2021) doi:10.21105/joss.03139.
